data.title: Michael Burry launches newsletter to lay out his AI bubble views after deregistering hedge fund
data.description: "The Big Short" investor is capitalizing on the massive audience he's built on X, where 1.6 million followers have long parsed his cryptic posts.
data.author: Yun Li
